# API Reference for cdktf.StackManifest

   StackManifest <a name="StackManifest" id="cdktf.StackManifest"></a>
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.StackManifest.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```csharp
  using HashiCorp.Cdktf;
  
  new StackManifest {
      StackAnnotation[] Annotations,
      string ConstructPath,
      string[] Dependencies,
      string Name,
      string SynthesizedStackPath,
      string WorkingDirectory
  };
  ```
